mainInfo.headline: Welcome to the Helldivers 2 Dashboard
description: This is a small HOBBY project for me to improve my skills on typescript and react
It is a dashboard for Helldivers 2, a game I love. The dashboard provides real-time war data, planetary information depending on the data provided by API responses

latestUpdates.headline: Latest Updates (Version 0.2.5) - 21st July 2025
items: UI Theme color to be more inline with Helldivers 2 - updated all pages color scheme
Integrated Motion library for some custom animations.
Removed Bootstrap JS dependencies as i plan to use react UI libraries for future updates.
Updated Navbar to be more responsive and user-friendly.
Slight Styling Refactoring for better readability and maintainability.
Added Campaign Card to Status Page for better campaign tracking.
